title: Inspiration for Design Entrepreneurs: Starting a $1-Million-a-Year Business Making Products Out of Recycled Chopsticks
description: Felix Böck figured out how to start a successful business that makes attractive, sustainable products out of waste. Specifically, used chopsticks. "Most disposable chopsticks are made from bamboo that is harvested, treated, dried and shaped in China," Böck's …
